channel.title: A letter of assignment, to Mod Ice!
channel.description:
Hi, it's me Jump On Java, i'm only back for about 5 minutes, and i will be leaving. During the last month or so, Me, Mod Ice and BillySmither was working on Player Owned Houses. BillySmither left. We had an agreement that if the group split up it would go to the person who wasn't leaving. It was Mod Ice. I'm leaving MoparScape because i have exams coming up and i've got an assignment to work at Java. I'm really pleased for all the other MoparScape coders out there. I hope you get to work at Java.
I promote Mod Ice with the rights to Player Owned Houses.
Farewell !
All my wishes to you.
-Jump On Java :| :)
P.S Oops, oh yes and Player Owned Houses will be started again from version 1.

item.title: A letter of assignment, to Mod Ice!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Ice Mod Ice
item.description:
@Mod_Ice wrote:

[b]Hi,

Thanks For The Credit Jump On Java, You Told Me On Msn That You Wasn’t Going To Post It On This Forum.
You Two Don’t Be Tight He’s Not Leaving Because Of His Exams, His Grandma Just Died.

Thanks Again Jump On Java,

-Mod Ice[/b]
[hr][b]You Should Be UnHappy That He’s Leaving.
You Should Also Be Ashamed That His Grandmother Has Died !
I Sure Would Be, If I Talked To A Person Like That.

I’m Ashamed To Know You !

-Mod Ice[/b]

Read full topic
item.source: A letter of assignment, to Mod Ice!

~Chaotic~:

Rule 5: There is no spamming allowed on this forum. If you are caught spamming, your post will be edited and if you continue it may result in a ban.

Hey atleast there is one less noob on these forums.

Hi, it’s me Jump On Java, i’m only back for about 5 minutes, and i will be leaving. During the last month or so, Me, Mod Ice and BillySmither was working on Player Owned Houses. BillySmither left.
